{{Description|Humanity's best friend!<br />Legend has it that the Inazuma Shogun once greatly adored this canine breed, and they spread across the once-booming trade routes to become one of the most well-loved pets in the seven nations. Gentle, loyal, and intelligent, they are especially good at guard duty and being companions. Some say that there are still mysterious ninjas in Inazuma who train these dogs to become "ninja dogs."|[[Archive]] Description}}

'''Shiba''' is a type of dog. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Common animals can be placed in indoor and outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.
